caption.p: ( a) Flow cytometry analysis of MDA-MB-231 and MCF-10A cells under action of B. salicifolius essential oil; ( b) Bar diagram demonstrates that there is no difference between control cells and treated cells at the concentration of essential oil determined by cytotoxic activity assays for both cells lines. Ctrl: control; Bs: treatment with B. salicifolius essential oil. Data are expressed as mean ± standard deviation for experiments carried out in triplicate. Comparison between bars was performed by two-way ANOVA test followed by Sidak’s test using GraphPad Prism 6.01.
